RustObject<T> - Class in mozilla.components.service.fxa
Base class that wraps an non-optional Pointer representing a pointer to a Rust object. This class implements Closeable but does not provide an implementation, forcing all subclasses to implement it. This ensures that all classes that inherit from RustObject will have their Pointer destroyed when the Java wrapper is destroyed.
RustObject() - Constructor for class mozilla.components.service.fxa.RustObject
Base class that wraps an non-optional Pointer representing a pointer to a Rust object. This class implements Closeable but does not provide an implementation, forcing all subclasses to implement it. This ensures that all classes that inherit from RustObject will have their Pointer destroyed when the Java wrapper is destroyed.
RustObject.Companion - Class in mozilla.components.service.fxa

T

then(fn) - Method in class mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult
Adds a value listener to be called when the class FxaResult is completed with a value. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.

toJSONString() - Method in class mozilla.components.service.fxa.FirefoxAccount
Saves the current account's authentication state as a JSON string, for persistence in the Android KeyStore/shared preferences. The authentication state can be restored using FirefoxAccount.Companion.fromJSONString.

W

whenComplete(fn) - Method in class mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult
